summary:
Fun Activities! 

At the farmhouse, children played age-old board games like Chowka-Baaraha, Pagade, Snake-and-Ladder, Aligulimane, Vimaana and math puzzles. We also played outdoor games like Tug-of-War, Lagori, Tennikoit and Cricket, Blind-Fold games.
